name: VolleyBomb
description:
Get it on with VolleyBomb!

Don't let the ball blow up in your face in this action-packed, minimalist sports game for 2. Easy to jump into, difficult not to yell at your friends about! Be the first on your block to win the Crown of Angular Awesomeness! ***

*** Nothing in the game refers to the crown as the "Crown of Angular Awesomeness".
